challengeName: IBM Castle - $500 Git Merge Calendar Navigator UI Prototype
detailedRequirements:
Welcome to the $500 IBM Castle - Git Merge Calendar Navigator UI Prototype

This F2F is subjective - so the first solution that the client likes and fulfills the required updates will win. We will consider all submissions until a the winner is declared.

This F2F Challenge is part of the IBM Castle Blitz Challenge Series. Make sure to check it out!
http://blitz.topcoder.com/ibmcastle/

This is FAST F2F! Help us submit fast deliverables in next 12hr!
finalSubmissionGuidelines:
IMPORTANT
- Provided UI Prototype is tested and works on mobile, tablet, desktop design screen. Do not break current functionality, look and feel.
- Let us know if you doubts about anything

Downloadable Files
- IBM-Castle-UIPrototype-Base.zip - Base UI Prototype
- IBM-Castle-UIPrototype-Calendar-Navigator.zip - Calendar Navigator UI Prototype
- Storyboard.zip - Storyboard as References

GITLAB RULES
- GITLAB branch as Base of UI Prototype Updates: https://gitlab.com/ibm-castle/ui/tree/30053843_Calendar_Navigator
- Post your gitlab username in challenge forum if you don't have access to our code yet.
- You must fork our repo and then work based on the specified branch, you must grant my username "lunarkid" access to your repo so that I can verify your merge request manually.  
- For the F2F Winner, you also need submit a merge request for issues you fix.
- Submit to O/R to let us notice your submission ready for review. And watch for any feedbacks!

F2F TASKS
- For this F2F We need you merge prototype on gitlab with the files/code differences between provided prototype
- HINTS: Compare both prototype using comparison file and submit updates on your repo
- Check provided storyboard for things we updated on Calendar Navigator UI Prototype
- You must re-test your updated prototype that you plan to submit on gitlab to be like attached prototype
- DO NOT make indentation changes. Please focus on completing F2F Tasks. We need your code easy to see the differences.

About Calendar Navigator
- Calendar Navigator is bottom bar that placed in the bottom of Inbox page
- Make sure whole element on this area captured
- RE-TEST AND COMPARE ON DESKTOP/TABLET/MOBILE SCREEN SIZE before you submit

CLIENT PRIORITIES (The items that are considered highest prototype priorities)
- Creating quality and efficient AngularJS/HTML/CSS3 code that works in all the requested browsers.

BROWSER REQUIREMENTS
- IE11
- Safari
- Chrome
- Firefox
- Safari on Tablet
- Safari on Mobile

F2F GUIDELINES
We will review submissions as they are submitted, we will review ALL submissions until we declare a winner based on
Pay attention to Forum activity!
1) Task Requirements
2) Client is happy with how it looks/works
3) Time the solution was submitted

Please let us know if you have any questions or need clarification on something

Thank you
